General.comment0: constant X position of the roll bar arm

Angle_of_Roll_Bar_Arm_from_Horizontal.comment0: length of the roll bar control rod
Angle_of_Roll_Bar_Arm_from_Horizontal.comment1: radius of the roll bar arm

Bump_Spring_Compression.comment0: uncompressed length of the bump spring
Bump_Spring_Compression.comment1: X position of the bump spring mounting point
Bump_Spring_Compression.comment2: Y position of the bump spring mounting point
